pre.expressions.pre.expressions: if ($G.bg and (null(fieldlist in $L.file) or lng(denull(fieldlist in $L.file))=0)) then (fieldlist in $L.file=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getColumnsFromUsergrid", inbox.type in $L.file))

if (null(fieldlist in $L.file) or lng(denull(fieldlist in $L.file))=0) then ($L.view.format=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getDefaultFormat", inbox.type in $L.file);if (index("$", $L.view.format)>0 or index("jscall", $L.view.format)>0) then ($L.inbox.default.format=evaluate(parse($L.view.format, 2))+".g") else ($L.inbox.default.format=$L.view.format+".g");fieldlist in $L.file=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getColumnsFromFormat", $L.inbox.default.format))

if (not (null(groupByFieldName in $L.file))) then ($L.group=jscall("convertToCaptions.getFieldCaptions", denull(groupByFieldName in $L.file), inbox.type in $L.file));for $L.fi = 1 to lng(denull($L.group)) do ($L.fi in $L.group)+=(" ("+scmsg(2 in $L.fi in groupBy in $L.file, "view")+")")

if (not (null(sortFieldName in $L.file))) then ($L.sort.names=jscall("convertToCaptions.getFieldCaptions", denull(sortFieldName in $L.file), inbox.type in $L.file));for $L.fi = 1 to lng(denull($L.sort.names)) do ($L.fi in $L.sort.names)+=(" ("+scmsg(3 in $L.fi in sortBy in $L.file, "view")+")")

$L.filter=scmsg(6, "view");if (not (null(query in $L.file)) and query in $L.file~="" and query in $L.file~="true") then ($L.filter=scmsg(7, "view");if (null(denull(search.fields in $L.file)) and null(denull(choices in $L.file)) and null(access.filter.xml in $L.file)) then ($L.filter=scmsg(8, "view")))
if (null(fieldlist in $L.file) or lng(denull(fieldlist in $L.file))=0) then ($L.field.list=scmsg(22, "view"))

if (not (null($L.autoformatRules1))) then ($autoformatRules=str(1 in 1 in autoFormat in $L.file));for $L.fi = 2 to lng(denull($L.autoformatRules1)) do $autoformatRules+=("; "+str(1 in $L.fi in autoFormat in $L.file))
